name: Fruit 8 Sudoku🍉
detailed_description:
Fruit 8 Sudoku is a classic 2x2 sudoku, where all puzzle digits are replaced by various fruits. You need to fill empty grids so that each fruit is unique in every row, every column and in its 2x2 box. In this DLC, you get 25 new beautiful images of fruits.

- easy and relaxing gameplay
- a pleasant music accompaniment
- trading cards
- a small price
- UHD (4K) resolution support (3840x2160 pixels)

This game is only first chapter of large world of Fruit 8 Sudoku, so let's start with a lung! :)

short_description: Fruit 8 Sudoku is a classic 2x2 sudoku, where all puzzle digits are replaced by various fruits. You need to fill empty grids so that each fruit is unique in every row, every column and in its 2x2 box.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Greek*, Danish*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Vietnamese*, Spanish - Latin America*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
